random-thumbnail-background.name: Display random Thumbnail background
random-thumbnail-background.description: Shows a random Thumbnail as background in the Better Level Thumbnails menu

dev-force-reauth.name: Force Reauthentication
dev-force-reauth.description: Force Reauthentication everytime you enter the Better Level Thumbnails menu, this is mainly for development purposes but can help fix issues after performing certain account management tasks.
